Producer: Sheldon Cohn, Gary Wolfson, Michael Manasseri, Jason Potash, Paul Finkel
Synopsis: Joey Miller is the king of Detroit party emcees, a single father, and drowning in debt. During one of his latest gigs, a freak accident destroys all his prized sound equipment. With his daughter Julie's bat mitzvah only four weeks away, he is willing to do almost anything to replace it. As a last resort, he turns to his shady Uncle Morty, who agrees to give him the needed 20 grand but under one condition: Joey must steal his grandmother Rose's top-secret kosher dill pickle recipe.
Title: The Pickle Recipe
